title: Understanding Conjugate Bases
text: A conjugate base is formed when an acid donates a proton (H+). Think about what remains after the acid loses a proton.

title: Identify the Acid
text: In the given problem, identify the acid. What is the chemical formula of the acid provided?

title: Remove a Proton
text: Once you have identified the acid, remove one hydrogen ion (H+) from it. What is the resulting chemical species?

title: Write the Conjugate Base
text: Write the chemical formula of the conjugate base formed when CH3COOH loses a proton.
